project_abstract.cdata: The Project aims to further strengthen ADBP as a sound and effective institution focusing principally on lending to smaller farmers. It would provide, through ADBP, loans to farmers for medium- and long-term agricultural investments in farm mechanization, implements and equipment, private minor irrigation, on-farm development and dairy animals.
